he brought her flowers he had picked from a forbidden location and she loved them .

output.sentences: Today we celebrated a month of dating.
We picked and loved the location for pictures.
We looked at each other profusely and thanked God for each other.
We held hands as we walked through the beautiful country.
We took some time to enjoy the scenery.
